channel.title: Vascular Development on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Vascular Development on funPlantGenes

item.title: ARF37;arftf29
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GRMZM2G086949 Gene Symbol: ARF37 arftf29 Gene Name: ARF-transcription factor 29 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: ARF8;arftf4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb067270 Gene Symbol: ARF8 arftf4 Gene Name: ARF-transcription factor 4 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: BdERECTA
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bradi1g46450 Gene Symbol: BdERECTA Gene Name: Genome: Species: Brachypodium distachyon Functional Descriptions: BdERECTA controls vasculature patterning and phloem-xylem organization in Brachypodium distachyon.

item.title: COMT;OsCOMT
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os08g06100 RAPdb gene ID: Os08g0157500 Gene Symbol: COMT OsCOMT OsCAldOMT1 ROMT9 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: CsAAP2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CsaV3_4G030920;Csa4G470690 Gene Symbol: CsAAP2 Gene Name: Amino Acid Permease 2 Genome: Cucurbit Genomics Database Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Disruption of the amino acid transporter CsAAP2 inhibits auxin-mediated root development in cucumber.

item.title: CsAAP2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa4G470690 Gene Symbol: CsAAP2 Gene Name: Genome: Cucumber (Chinese Long) v3 Genome Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: CsAAP2 knockout lines exhibited arrested development of root meristem, which then caused the delayed initiation of lateral root and the inhibition of root elongation.

item.title: CsIVP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cucsa_101020.1 Gene Symbol: CsIVP Gene Name: Irregular Vasculature Patterning Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: CsIVP Modulates Low Nitrogen and High-Temperature Resistance in Cucumber.

item.title: FIB;TSG1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os01g07500 RAPdb gene ID: Os01g0169800 Gene Symbol: FIB TSG1 OsFIB MHZ10 OsTAR2 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: GmEXPB2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmEXPB2 Gene Name: β-expansin gene Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmEXPB2, a Cell Wall β-Expansin, Affects Soybean Nodulation through Modifying Root Architecture and Promoting Nodule Formation and Development.

item.title: LeFRK2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeFRK2 Gene Name: fructokinase2 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: LeFRK2 is required for phloem and xylem differentiation and the transport of both sugar and water.

item.title: LjIPT3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LjIPT3 Gene Name: isopentenyltransferase3 Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: Knockdown of LjIPT3 influences nodule development in Lotus japonicus.

item.title: MtbHLH1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MtbHLH1 Gene Name: basic helix loop helix 1 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: MtbHLH1, a bHLH transcription factor involved in Medicago truncatula nodule vascular patterning and nodule to plant metabolic exchanges.

item.title: MtNOOT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr7g090020.1 Gene Symbol: MtNOOT1 Gene Name: NODULE ROOT1 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: The Medicago truncatula nodule identity gene MtNOOT1 is required for coordinated apical-basal development of the root.

item.title: MtNOOT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr7g090020 Gene Symbol: MtNOOT1 Gene Name: NODULE ROOT1 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: The Medicago truncatula nodule identity gene MtNOOT1 is required for coordinated apical-basal development of the root.

item.title: MtZR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MtZR1 Gene Name: PRAF family Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: MtZR1, a PRAF protein, is involved in the development of roots and symbiotic root nodules in Medicago truncatula.

item.title: OsNPF2.2
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os12g44100 RAPdb gene ID: Os12g0638200 Gene Symbol: OsNPF2.

item.title: OsOFP2
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os01g43610 RAPdb gene ID: Os01g0625900 Gene Symbol: OsOFP2 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: PagGRF12a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.001G114000 Gene Symbol: PagGRF12a Gene Name: Genome: Populus trichocarpa genome() Species: Populus alba × Populus glandulosa Functional Descriptions: PagGRF12a interacts with PagGIF1b to regulate secondary xylem development through modulating PagXND1a expression in Populus alba x P.

item.title: PAM1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PAM1 Gene Name: penetration and arbuscule morphogenesis 1 Genome: Species: Petunia hybrida Functional Descriptions: We have previously identified a mutant in Petunia hybrida, penetration and arbuscule morphogenesis 1 (PAM1), that is defective in the intracellular stages of AM development.

item.title: PdGNC
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.006G229200 Gene Symbol: PdGNC Gene Name: Genome: Species: Populus trichocarpa Functional Descriptions: The GATA transcription factor GNC (PdGNC) plays an important role in photosynthesis and growth in poplar.

item.title: PsAS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PsAS1 Gene Name: Asparagine synthetase 1 Genome: Species: Pinus sylvestris Functional Descriptions: Coordination of PsAS1 and PsASPG expression controls timing of re-allocated N utilization in hypocotyls of pine seedlings.

item.title: PsASPG
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PsASPG Gene Name: L-asparaginase Genome: Species: Pinus sylvestris Functional Descriptions: Coordination of PsAS1 and PsASPG expression controls timing of re-allocated N utilization in hypocotyls of pine seedlings.

item.title: PtaRHE1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PtaRHE1 Gene Name: RING-H2 ATL family protein1 Genome: C9D740 Species: Populus tremula × Populus alba Functional Descriptions: PtaRHE1, a Populus tremula × Populus alba RING-H2 protein of the ATL family, has a regulatory role in secondary phloem fibre development.

item.title: PtrWOX4a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.014G025300 Gene Symbol: PtrWOX4a Gene Name: WUSCHEL-RELATED HOMEOBOX4 Genome: Species: Populus trichocarpa Functional Descriptions: Cell-type-specific PtrWOX4a and PtrVCS2 form a regulatory nexus with a histone modification system for stem cambium development in Populus trichocarpa.

item.title: PvWOX3a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Pavir.8KG017200 Gene Symbol: PvWOX3a Gene Name: WUSCHEL-related homeobox transcription factor Genome: Species: Panicum virgatum Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of PvWOX3a in switchgrass promotes stem development and increases plant height.

item.title: RUM1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb156910 Gene Symbol: RUM1 Gene Name: ROOTLESS WITH UNDETECTABLE MERISTEMS 1 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: SDG128
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb308480 Gene Symbol: SDG128 Gene Name: set domain gene128 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: SlCyp1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlCyp1 Gene Name: low-temperature-induced cysteine proteinase Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Here, we show that, in tomato, translocation of a phloem-mobile cyclophilin, SlCyp1, from a wild-type scion into a mutant rootstock results in restoration of vascular development and lateral root initiation.

item.title: SlFRK3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlFRK3 Gene Name: fructokinase3 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: The tomato plastidic fructokinase SlFRK3 plays a role in xylem development.

item.title: SlSWEET15
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc09g074530 Gene Symbol: SlSWEET15 Gene Name: sugars will eventually be exported transporter 15 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Transporter SlSWEET15 unloads sucrose from phloem and seed coat for fruit and seed development in tomato.
